attributes.action: For captain Tom Moore to be given a knighthood from the queen
attributes.background: I would like the queen to to give captain Tom Moore a knighthood for the great work he has done to raise money for the nhs during the corona virus outbreak

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
